oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parents' Weekend Press Release
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Universities & colleges; Thomas Center;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Christian Brothers Director of Public Relations, Kenneth Kern, announced the events scheduled during 1971s Parents' Weekend: the dedication of the Thomas Center, the inauguration of Brother Malcolm as the new President of the college, a civic recognition of the 100th anniversary of CBC's founding, and more.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. Users are solely responsible for determining the existence of such instances and for obtaining any other permissions and paying associated fees that may be necessary for the intended use. Any image from the library's collection must cite as the source: Brother I. Leo O'Donnell Archives, Plough Library, Christian Brothers University. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
